overview: TalkOnPaper is an academic video platform that enables scholars to transcend geographical, visa, and language barriers by creating spoken explanations of published academic papers. The platform prioritizes academic legitimacy, accessibility, and long-term archival value, serving as a permanent, citable repository for paper-based academic discourse. Every piece of content is strictly tied to published research, ensuring scholarly rigor while democratizing access to academic knowledge through video explanations and automated English dubbing services.
objectives: Break down structural barriers preventing Global South scholars from achieving global academic visibility
Create a permanent, citable archive of academic paper explanations with DOI-level credibility
Provide cost-effective alternative to physical conference attendance through digital academic discourse
Establish sustainable revenue model through premium English auto-dubbing services for international scholars
Build SEO-optimized, evergreen academic content discoverable through search engines for decades
Maintain strict academic legitimacy by requiring all content to be based on published papers

functional_requirements.description: Paper verification system requiring DOI, journal reference, or archive link before Talk creation
Video upload and hosting system with global CDN distribution via Cloudflare R2
Automated English dubbing service for premium subscribers using AI voice synthesis
Permanent Talk page generation with citable URLs linked to original publications
Search and discovery system optimized for academic topics, authors, and institutions
Speaker profile management with academic credentials and publication history
Premium subscription management system for auto-dubbing and enhanced hosting services
Long-term archival system ensuring content availability for decades with backup redundancy
SEO optimization engine for academic content discoverability through search engines
Editorial workflow system for content moderation and academic quality assurance

acceptance_criteria: All Talks must be linked to verifiable published academic papers with DOI or archive reference
Premium auto-dubbing service achieves 95% accuracy rate for English translation
Talk pages remain accessible and citable for minimum 10 years with permanent URLs
Search system returns relevant academic content within 2 seconds for 90% of queries
Platform supports scholars from at least 50 countries with multi-language interface
Video content loads within 5 seconds globally through CDN distribution
Editorial workflow processes new submissions within 48 hours
Premium subscription conversion rate exceeds 8% among active Talk creators

risks.risk: Academic legitimacy questioned due to content quality
risks.mitigation: Implement strict paper verification and editorial oversight

risks.risk: Auto-dubbing technology produces poor quality translations
risks.mitigation: Partner with established AI providers and implement quality controls

risks.risk: Low adoption among target Global South academics
risks.mitigation: Direct outreach to academic institutions and conference partnerships

risks.risk: Copyright issues with published paper content
risks.mitigation: Legal framework ensuring fair use and author permissions

risks.risk: Technical infrastructure cannot handle global video distribution
risks.mitigation: Leverage Cloudflare R2 and implement progressive scaling

non_goals: General educational content not based on published academic papers
Social media features like comments, likes, or viral content promotion
Live streaming or real-time interaction capabilities
Monetization through advertising or non-academic revenue streams
Content moderation for political or controversial topics unrelated to academic discourse
Integration with general video platforms like YouTube or TikTok
success_metrics: Academic impact: Number of Talks cited in subsequent scholarly publications
Global reach: Geographic diversity of speakers and viewers across continents
Premium conversion: Percentage of scholars upgrading to auto-dubbing services
Long-term value: Average lifespan and continued access of archived Talks
Academic legitimacy: Rate of content acceptance by institutional libraries
Barrier reduction: Documented cases of increased visibility for underrepresented scholars
Research amplification: Papers gaining increased citations after Talk publication
